title: Front end stuff
text: Did I mention I like working with JavaScript? In the ever changing world of FE I try my best to keep up to date. React, Vue (Nuxt.js), Webpack, SCSS, semantic HTML5, Bootstrap, jQuery.

title: Back end
text: I think its important to try and have a broad understanding of how the entire stack works, I like working with Node.js, currently working mostly with Symfony and I have some Laravel experience too.

title: Work Flow
text: Mostly have experience working in a sprint based system which personally works well for me: Jira, Trello, Gitlab, Github and mostly gitflow. I'm 100% flexible and happy to use what works best for the team.

title: What else?
text: I’m not a pro designer but I enjoy prototyping / web design and I’m really interested in working towards good UX/UI. I usually work on macOS but I'm open to anything.
